[ library(xref) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

call_graph(+File, -Graph, +Options)

Compute a call graph for a source module file
File
Name of the source file (atom or string)
Graph
Variable, returns a graph structure
Options
A list of Option:Value structures

Description

Computes a call graph for the given source file. The graph is in the format defined by lib(graph_algorithms). The relevant options are:
builtins ('off' or 'on')
selects whether to include built-in predicates or not. Default: off.

See Also

xref / 2, library(graph_algorithms)
